00027 #include <QTime>
00028 #include <QDir>
00029 #include "elementdatabase.h"
00030 #include "xmlparser.h"
00031 
00032 ElementDatabase::~ElementDatabase()
00033 {
00034         foreach(Element::Ptr ep, mElementHash) {
00035                 delete ep;
00036         }
00037 }
00038 
00039 void 
00040 ElementDatabase::addFromFile(const QString& fn)
00041 {
00042         XmlParser p;
00043         foreach(Element::Ptr ep, p.read(fn)) {
00044                 if (ep.isNull() || !ep->isValid()) return;
00045                 mElementHash.insert(makeKey(*ep), ep);
00046         }
00047 }
00048 
00049 void 
00050 ElementDatabase::addFromDirectory(const QString& path)
00051 {
00052         QTime timer;
00053         timer.start();
00054         QDir dir(path);
00055         QStringList nameFilters;
00056         nameFilters << "*.xml";
00057         QStringList dirList = dir.entryList(nameFilters);
00058         foreach(const QString file, dirList) {
00059                 addFromFile(path + "/" + file);
00060         }
00061 #if DEBUG
00062         std::cerr << "element data directory read time: " 
00063                 << timer.elapsed() << "ms" << std::endl;
00064 #endif
00065 }
00066 
00067 const 
00068 ElementDatabase::KeyType ElementDatabase::makeKey(const cfp::ChemicalElementInterface& e)
00069 {
00070         KeyType key(e.uniqueName().c_str());
00071         return key;
00072 }
00073 
00074 Element::Ptr 
00075 ElementDatabase::getElement(const KeyType& key)
00076 {
00077         return mElementHash.value(key);
00078 }
00079 
00080 Element::Ptr 
00081 ElementDatabase::getElement(const cfp::ChemicalElementInterface& e)
00082 {
00083         return mElementHash.value(makeKey(e));
00084 }
00085 
00086 QStringList 
00087 ElementDatabase::getSymbolList() const
00088 {
00089         QStringList symList;
00090         foreach(Element::Ptr ep, mElementHash) {
00091                 symList << ep->uniqueName().c_str();
00092         }
00093         symList.sort();
00094         return symList;
00095 }
00096 
00097 std::ostream& 
00098 operator<<(std::ostream& o, const ElementDatabase& db)
00099 {
00100         o << "elements("<<db.mElementHash.size()<<"): ";
00101         foreach(QString str, db.getSymbolList()) {
00102                 o << str.toStdString() << " ";
00103         }
00104         return o;
00105 }
00106 
00107 ElementDatabase::Iterator 
00108 ElementDatabase::begin() const
00109 {
00110         return mElementHash.constBegin();
00111 }
00112 
00113 ElementDatabase::Iterator 
00114 ElementDatabase::end() const
00115 {
00116         return mElementHash.constEnd();
00117 }
00118 
00119 void 
00120 ElementDatabase::addAlias(const KeyType& key, const cfp::Compound& compound)
00121 {
00122         mAliasHash.insert(key, compound);
00123 }
00124 
00125 const cfp::Compound 
00126 ElementDatabase::getAlias(const KeyType& key) const
00127 {
00128         return mAliasHash.value(key);
00129 }
00130 
00131 const cfp::Compound 
00132 ElementDatabase::getAlias(const cfp::ChemicalElementInterface& e) const
00133 {
00134         return mAliasHash.value(makeKey(e));
00135 }
